Athos (Matthew Macfadyen), Porthos (Ray Stevenson) y A...","plot":"Francia, siglo XVII. Athos (Matthew Macfadyen), Porthos (Ray Stevenson) y Aramis (Luke Evans) son tres prodigiosos espadachines que pertenecen al cuerpo de mosqueteros del rey Luis XIII de Francia (1610-1643). A Par\u00eds llega un joven y valeroso gasc\u00f3n, D'Artagnan (Logan Lerman), que ingresa en la guardia del Rey para hacerse mosquetero. Los cuatro tendr\u00e1n que hacer frente a una maquiav\u00e9lica conspiraci\u00f3n urdida por el cardenal Richelieu (Christoph Waltz) para derrocar al rey (Freddie Fox).","cast":[{"name":"Matthew Macfadyen","role":"Athos","images":{"face":"\/89\/9c\/899c984509c38ac0ab424145e4bff516.jpg"},"id":16652},{"name":"Milla Jovovich","role":"Milady de Winter","images":{"face":"\/35\/e7\/35e7c662da74fda9d012f8dbddb96262.jpg"},"id":16078},{"name":"Helen George","role":"Blonde","images":{"face":"\/8c\/64\/8c649f93be622335352aa73a5df453b4.jpg"},"id":20194},{"name":"Christian Oliver","role":"Venetian Nobleman","images":{"face":"\/17\/b1\/17b1bbd1e8ce13a141e2a1a1e1749e51.jpg"},"id":6160},{"name":"Luke Evans","role":"Aramis","images":{"face":"\/c2\/a6\/c2a62b7f039e013233edb1fa0bea04a6.jpg"},"id":209},{"name":"Ray Stevenson","role":"Porthos","images":{"face":"\/45\/e2\/45e2536d459a046a282161d51960d8ba.jpg"},"id":8661},{"name":"Til Schweiger","role":"Cagliostro","images":{"face":"\/a5\/bd\/a5bd4b24bb994f130ca770ddc164ab9d.jpg"},"id":16098},{"name":"Markus Brandl","role":"Sergeant Venetian Guard","images":null},{"name":"Orlando Bloom","role":"Duke of Buckingham","images":{"face":"\/f2\/ce\/f2cea9813f0850ef86cdd64660849247.jpg"},"id":4909},{"name":"Logan Lerman","role":"D'Artagnan","images":{"face":"\/99\/f9\/99f9c5d75a5399e9bcee2d8d02493f33.jpg"},"id":2135}],"genres":["Action","Adventure","Romance"],"distributor":null,"numInteractions":2049,"numRatings":588,"ratingHistogram":{"1":29,"2":53,"3":262,"4":202,"5":42},"seasonsBlocked":[],"producers":[{"name":"Constantin Film Produktion","images":null},{"name":"Impact Pictures","images":null},{"name":"Nouvelles \u00c9ditions de Films (NEF)","images":null}],"writers":[{"name":"Alex Litvak","images":null,"id":66072},{"name":"Andrew Davies","images":null,"id":44233}],"countries":["DE","FR","GB","US"],"directors":[{"name":"Paul W.S.
